START.name: Sample Gates
START.desc: The large limestone archs rise in front of you! To the East is more of campus, and to your west lies Kirkwood Avenue.

East of Gates.name: East of Gates
East of Gates.desc: To your North is Franklin Hall, and to your South is Dunn Woods

Dunn Meadow.name: Dunn Meadow
Dunn Meadow.desc: A large meadow stretches out in front of you. Some students are throwing a frisbee, while others study in the shade.

Law School.name: Law School
Law School.desc: Students hurry in and out of the Law School. Some lose the papers they carry as the wind blows.

Stadium.name: Stadium
Stadium.desc: Memorial Stadium rises high off the ground. The first game is still weeks away, but some students are getting their pre-pre-pre tailgating in.

IMU.name: IMU
IMU.desc: The Indiana Memorial Union is one of the centerpieces of IU's Campus. Always a good place to eat lunch, meet for group projects, or find a quiet place to study.

Dunn Woods.name: Dunn Woods
Dunn Woods.desc: Birds chirp pleasently overheads, and the occasional squirrl runs from tree to tree. This would be a good place to study!

Kirkwood.name: Kirkwood
Kirkwood.desc: The bodies of drunk students litter the streets, while others stumble out of Kilroys. Amazingly, they will all be in class tomorrow.

Ballantine.name: Ballantine
Ballantine.desc: 'Philanthrapy at work' reads signs around Ballantine Hall. They probably won't be done for another ten years.

Third Street.name: Third Street
Third Street.desc: Busses and cars fly past, while students seem to challenge them in a game of chicken. You can faintly smell pizza coming from Mother Bears, the best pizza in Bloomington.

Jacobs.name: Jacobs
Jacobs.desc: Students carrying all manner of instruments run back and forth outside of Jacobs School of Music. One student intricately explains the difference between a violin and a viola to anyone walking by.

Musical Arts Center.name: Musical Arts Center
Musical Arts Center.desc: An odd assortment of bright red shapes sits in front of the Musical Arts Center. That's what modern art looks like, you suppose.

Fountain.name: Showalter Fountain
Fountain.desc: A beautiful fountain sits at the center of three buildings. Students walk in the street, daring busses to run them down in a desperate hope of free tuition.

Kelly.name: Kelly School of Business
Kelly.desc: Students flood the area outside of the business school. Many of them wear suits that don't quite fit, and you often hear them explain to others 'Yeah, I was a direct admit to Kelly'

Wells.name: Wells Library
Wells.desc: As it is the start of the year, the students inside Wells library seem to be full of hope and excitement. However, soon they will begin to forage for beer and Cup of Noodles, getting themselves ready for the long winter and second eight weeks.

Assembly Hall.name: Assembly Hall
Assembly Hall.desc: You look at Assembly Hall and wonder if the men's basketball team will be any good this year. Probably not.

END.name: Classroom
END.desc: You take the elevator to the 5th floor and make it to class, just in time!
